channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: Xiaomi reportedly plans to make electric cars
item.description: Xiaomi is said to be designing its own EVs. and it would use a plant from Chinese car giant Great Wall to produce them.

item.title: 'Halo Infinite' is the first game in the series to support spatial audio
item.description: 'Halo Infinite' will be the first title in the series to support spatial audio like Dolby Atmos, Windows Sonic, and DTS Headphone:X.

item.title: Engadget Podcast: Why the Biden admin wants Big Tech critics
item.description: This week, we explore why the Biden admission is bringing on Big Tech critics like Lina Khan and Tim Wu. It seems like they're gearing up to regulate the tech world even more.

item.title: Apple may launch a rugged Watch for extreme sports
item.description: Apple is reportedly planning to make a Watch version with a rugged casing designed for extreme sports and weather.

item.title: Razer confirms plans to manufacture its smart RGB face mask
item.description: Razer CEO Min-Liang Tan told Yahoo Finance that the electronics maker plans to turn the Project Hazel concept masks into reality.

item.title: The Morning After: Congress tries to grill Big Tech's CEOs
item.description: Today’s headlines: Congress questioned Big Tech CEOs for 5 hours without getting any good answers, Google's new alliance wants to get digital keys and mobile IDs working on Android, and Sigma's fp L is a tiny full-frame camera with a 61-megapixel sensor.

item.title: US labor board orders Elon Musk to delete a threatening tweet from 2018
item.description: The National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) has found that Tesla violated US labor laws by firing a union activist and threatening workers' benefits via a tweet from CEO Elon Musk.

item.title: Amazon's redesigned Fire TV interface rolls out to more devices
item.description: Amazon is rolling out the redesigned Fire TV UI to more devices, namely the Fire TV Stick 4K, Fire TV Cube (first- and second-gen) and Fire TV (third-gen pendant design).

item.title: Amazon's 64GB Fire HD 10 tablet is almost half price at $108
item.description: Amazon's big screen Fire HD 10 tablet with 64GB of storage is down to almost half its original price as part of a Deal of the Day offer.

item.title: Drako's $1.2 million EV supercar goes drifting on an ice lake
item.description: Drako took its 1,200 horsepower GTE supercar EV around a snow track and ice lake to show what its 4WD torque-vectoring system could do.

item.title: Sony's latest free PlayStation games include 'The Witness'
item.description: Just like what Sony promised back in February, it's giving away more PlayStation games this month as part of its Play At Home program — and yes, you still don't need a PS Plus subscription to get them.

item.title: WSJ: Microsoft is now in 'exclusive' talks to acquire Discord
item.description: Microsoft is in 'advanced' talks to buy Discord for more than $10 billion.

item.title: Congress questioned Big Tech CEOs for 5 hours without getting any good answers
item.description: More than five hours of questioning later, we have learned very little about the state of disinformation from today’s marathon hearing with Mark Zuckerberg, Jack Dorsey and Sundar Pichai.

item.title: 'Axiom Verge 2' developer shows off some gameplay ahead of its spring launch
item.description: 'Axiom Verge 2' will bring more side-scrolling pixelated gameplay to Switch and the Epic Games Store when it launches this spring.

item.title: Amazon starts vaccinating employees in Missouri, Nevada and Kansas
item.description: Amazon says it will expand the program once more vaccines become available in other states.

item.title: Google's new alliance wants to get digital keys, mobile IDs working on Android
item.description: The Android Ready SE Alliance aims to accelerate the adoption of features like mobile IDs and digital keys on Android.

item.title: Samsung's T7 Touch SSD is cheaper than ever on Amazon
item.description: Save big on Samsung's T7 Touch 500GB portable SSD on Amazon -- it's 20 percent off right now.

item.title: 'Total War: Rome Remastered' revives an RTS classic on April 29th
item.description: Rome: Total War, one of the best real-time strategy games ever released, is getting a remaster.

item.title: Samsung adds a podcast section to its free-entertainment app
item.description: If you own a Samsung phone, you now have yet another way to listen to your favorite audio shows

item.title: 'Back 4 Blood' is delayed until October 12th
item.description: The spiritual successor to 'Left 4 Dead' was supposed to come out in June.

item.title: Sony is making a 'Ghost of Tsushima' movie with John Wick director
item.description: Ghost of Tsushima is getting the silver screen treatment.

item.title: Porsche adds the Taycan EV to its car subscription service
item.description: The Taycan 4S won't be available on the multi-vehicle plan at first, however.

item.title: Triumph previews TE-1 electric bike concept with fast charging battery
item.description: Historic British motorcycle Triumph has shared some of the first details on its TE-1 electric bike project.

item.title: What it will take for humans to colonize the Moon and Mars
item.description: When it lifts off in late 2024, NASA's Artemis mission will perform crucial groundwork needed for humanity to further explore and potentially colonize the Moon as well as eventually serve as a jumping-off point in our quest to reach Mars. But given how inhospitable space is, NASA and its partners will face a significant challenge in keeping tomorrow's colonists alive and well.

item.title: Paramount+ will stream Serie A soccer in the US starting next season
item.description: ViacomCBS snatched the rights away from ESPN+.
